submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        stop = len(colors) - 1 # Non devo far partire ricerca piú avanti di qui
        colors = colors + colors + colors
        i, j = 0, 0
        previous_color = None
        res = 0

        while i <= stop and j < stop + k:
            if i == j:
                previous_color = colors[j]
                j = j + 1
                continue
            
            if previous_color == colors[j]:
                # Calcoli ricominciare
                length = j - i
                res = res + max(0, length - k + 1)

                i, j = j, j
                continue

            if previous_color != colors[j]:
                previous_color = colors[j]
                j = j + 1
                continue
            
        res = res + max(0, j - i - k + 1)

        return res
